info.title: TON API
info.description: API for interacting with The Open Network (TON) blockchain

get.description: Retrieves a list of NFT collections from the TON blockchain

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of collections to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of collections to skip before starting to return results

address.description: The address of the NFT collection

name.description: The name of the NFT collection

description.description: The description of the NFT collection

metadata.description: Additional metadata of the NFT collection

owner.description: The owner's address of the NFT collection

raw_collection_content.description: The raw content of the NFT collection

next_item_index.description: The index of the next item in the collection

icon.description: The URL of the collection's icon
